articles.title: Remains of mother who vanished in 2012 found in pond near Disney World, family says - CBS News
articles.description: Searchers say the sonar technology used to find Sandra Lemire's remains was not available when she disappeared while driving her grandmother's minivan in 2012.
articles.content:
A missing woman's remains were finally found in Florida over the weekend, almost 12 years after she disappeared while driving home from a date near Disney World, according to her family.
